model-1.name: DistilBERT
model-1.info: This as DistilBERT model that is fine-tuned on Sentiment Analysis for Financial News dataset. The News is classified into 2 categories: Positive, Negative. URL to the dataset: shorturl.at/kzM69

model-2.name: RoBERTa
model-2.info: This as RoBERTa model that is fine-tuned IMDB Reviews dataset. Reviews being classified into one of the 3 categories: Positive, Negative or Neutral. URL to the dataset: shorturl.at/gjD56

model-1.name: DistilBERT
model-1.info: This model is trained on News Aggregator Dataset from UC Irvin Machine Learning Repository. The news headlines are classified into 4 categories: Business, Science and Technology, Entertainment, Health. URL to the dataset is: shorturl.at/qzL56

model-1.name: spaCy
model-1.info: This is a pre-trained model availabe from spaCy python library. URL to the model details: https://spacy.io/models/en

model-1.name: T5
model-1.info: This as T5 model fine-tuned for summarization task. This model will only generate summaries if the text is greater than 150 words. The following dataset is used for fine-tuning: shorturl.at/jnwMW
